slieb.kute.api

Interface Resource.Writable

  • All Superinterfaces:
    Resource, Serializable
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    FileResource, MutableBytesArrayResource, OutputStreamResource
    Enclosing interface:
    Resource

    public static interface Resource.Writable
extends Resource, Serializable
    This represents a Writable resource. You can call getWriter() on it to get a writer that will write to the resource.

    • Nested Class Summary

      • Nested classes/interfaces inherited from interface slieb.kute.api.Resource

        Resource.Checksumable, Resource.Creator, Resource.Provider, Resource.Readable, Resource.Writable
